title: Total damage costs from global natural disasters
subtitle: Total economic cost of damages as a result of global natural disasters in any given year, measured in current US$. This includes those from drought, floods, biological epidemics, extreme weather, extreme temperature, landslides, dry mass movements, extraterrestrial impacts, wildfires, volcanic activity and earthquakes.
sourceDesc: EMDAT: OFDA/CRED International Disaster Database, Université catholique de Louvain – Brussels – Belgium
